location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map showing the area and situation of the civil aircraft landing ground on Muharraq Island

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: ParchmentDimensions: 680 x 598 mmFoliation: The map has a folio number (62) on the front in its top-right corner. The number is enclosed by a circle.

mods.abstract: The map shows Muhurraq Island, and the causeway linking Muharraq to Manama. Also shown are principal roads, tracks, buildings (including the Political Agency in Manana), islands, and the location of several underwater freshwater springs. A rectangle on Muharraq Island indicates the area specified for the landing ground.The letter to which the map was enclosed (f 60) states that the map is a print taken from the master copy of a map of the Bahrain Islands, the data for which was collected by the Desert Survey Officer on his visit to Bahrain in December 1936.
